briefdescription.para: Points defining the selection polygon.
Number of points defining the selection polygon.
Boolean used to know if there is a closing line for the polygon and so if it is necessary to remove it.
Minimal abscissa in window coordinate.
Maximal abscissa in window coordinate.
Minimal ordinate in window coordinate.
Maximal ordinate in window coordinate.
Boolean used to correctely erase the closed polygon.
The abscissa dimension.
The ordinate dimension.
The dimension of the time.
Sampling rate (time between two samples) in micro second.
The step, in second, used to draw information mark on the time axis.
The step, in recording unit, used to draw information mark on the time axis.
A cursor to represent the selection of time state.

memberdef.argsstring: (KlustersDoc &doc, KlustersView &view, QColor backgroundColor, int timeInterval, KStatusBar *statusBar, QWidget *parent=0, const char *name=0, int minSize=50, int maxSize=4000, int windowTopLeft=-500, int windowBottomRight=1001, int border=0)
memberdef.name: ClusterView

briefdescription.para: Informs if the user is currently making a selection.

simplesect.para: true if a selection is in process, false othewise.

briefdescription.para: Returns the current abscissa dimension.
Returns the current ordinate dimension.
Takes into account the update of the dimension used to present the clusters.
Updates the view only for one cluster for which the color has been changed.

parameterdescription.para: cluster Id for which the color have changed.
true if the view is the active one, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Draws an additional cluster to those already shown.

detaileddescription.para:
This method aims to reduce the number of clusters to draw.
clusterId
cluster Id to add to the clusters already drawn
active
true if the view is the active one, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Removes a cluster from those already shown.

detaileddescription.para:
Which impose to redraw everything
clusterId
cluster Id to remove.
active
true if the view is the active one, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Adds a newly created cluster to those already shown.

detaileddescription.para:
This method aims to reduce the number of clusters to draw.
fromClusters
list of clusters from which the spikes of the new cluster are coming.
clusterId
cluster Id to add to the clusters already drawn
active
true if the view is the active one, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Adds a newly created cluster to those already shown.

detaileddescription.para:
This method aims to reduce the number of clusters to draw.
clusterId
cluster Id to add to the clusters already drawn
active
true if the view is the active one, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Update the content of the widget due to the removal of spikes in a cluster.

detaileddescription.para:
This method aims to reduce the number of clusters to draw.
fromClusters
list of clusters from which the spikes have been taken.
active
true if the view is the active one, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Update the content of the widget due to the addition of spikes in a cluster.

detaileddescription.para:
This method aims to reduce the number of clusters to draw.
clusterId
cluster Id to which the spikes have been added
active
true if the view is the active one, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Method call when no spikes have been found in a polygon of selection.
Change the current mode, call by a selection of a tool.

parameterdescription.para: new mode of drawing (selection or zoom)

briefdescription.para: Update the clusters which have been modified by the suppression of spikes (used to create a new cluster or simply move to the cluster of noise or artefact).

detaileddescription.para:
This method aims to reduce the number of clusters to draw. The view is redraw only if isModifiedByDeletion is true.
modifiedClusters
list of clusters from which spikes were taken from.
active
true if the view is the active one, false otherwise.
isModifiedByDeletion
true if the clusters of modifiedClusters have been modified by the deletion of spikes (moved to cluster 0 or 1, cluster of artefact and cluster of noise respectively).

briefdescription.para: Update the clusters which have been modified by the suppression of spikes (used to create a new cluster or simply move to the cluster of noise or artefact).

detaileddescription.para:
This method is call only during an undo otherwise the updateClusters is call. There are 2 functions in order to reduce the number of clusters to draw whenever possible.
modifiedClusters
list of clusters from which spikes were taken from.
active
true if the view is the active one, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Updates the time interval in second and in recording unit using step given in second.

parameterdescription.para: the interval to use in second.

briefdescription.para: Updates the time interval between time lines.

detaileddescription.para:
The update is made both in second and in recording unit using step given in second. This is an overloaded member function to be called when the user changes the settings.
step
the interval to use in second.
active
true if the view is the active one, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Prints the currently display information on a printer via the painter printPainter.

parameterdescription.para: painter on a printer.
object providing information about the printer.
true if the printed background has to be white, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Draws the contents of the frame.

parameterdescription.para: painter used to draw the contents

briefdescription.para: The view responds to a resize event.

parameterdescription.para: resize event.

briefdescription.para: The view responds to a mouse release.

parameterdescription.para: mouse event.

briefdescription.para: The view responds to a mouse click.

parameterdescription.para: mouse release event.

briefdescription.para: The view responds to a mouse move.

parameterdescription.para: mouse event.

briefdescription.para: The view responds to a double click.

parameterdescription.para: mouse event.

briefdescription.para: Treat the events informing that it is time to compute the new data due to the selection polygon.
Draws the spikes of the clusters in the list clustersList on the given painter.

parameterdescription.para: painter on which to draw the spikes
list of clusters to draw

briefdescription.para: Returns the color associated with one of the selection mode.

detaileddescription.para:
This color will be use to draw the polygon of selection.
color to be used

briefdescription.para: Erase any polygon of selection in the double buffer and reset the associated variables.
Erase the last line drawn while drawing the polygon of selection in the double buffer.

parameterdescription.para: color used to draw the line (to erase the line another line is draw on top of it)

briefdescription.para: Erase the last line drawn during a mousemove event while drawing the polygon of selection in the double buffer.

parameterdescription.para: color used to draw the line (to erase the line another line is draw on top of it)

briefdescription.para: Adds a cluster to the list of clusters to update.

parameterdescription.para: id of the cluster to update.

briefdescription.para: Draws the axis for the current dimensions.

parameterdescription.para: painter on which to draw the axes

briefdescription.para: Set of instructions need it in order to enable a correct redraw when the drawContents is called.
Draws information on the time axis.

parameterdescription.para: painter on which to draw the information

briefdescription.para: Returns a new ComputeEvent.
View displaying spikes in the PCA feature space.

detaileddescription.para:
Through this view the user can act upon the clusters by selecting spikes. All modification request is sent to the KlustersDoc object and the view is automatically updated via KlustersView when the clusters have been changed.
Lynn Hazan
